sys_element_mapping.value: sleep 5 kubectl -n boutique get deployment {{action.deployment}} > /dev/null 2>&1 if [ $? -eq 0 ] ; then ./deploy_cartservice_v1.sh > deploy.out sleep 5 fi out=`kubectl -n boutique get deployment {{action.deployment}} 2>&1 1>/dev/null | cut -d '(' -f2 | cut -d ')' -f1` while [ $out != "NotFound" ] ; do sleep 2 out=`kubectl -n boutique get deployment {{action.deployment}} 2>&1 1>/dev/null | cut -d '(' -f2 | cut -d ')' -f1` done echo $out
